title: Spirit: A Magazine of Poetry
additional-note: A 1974 renewal for the book 'Return to Poetry' notes that its contents were previously published in 'Spirit' from 1931 to 1946.  No specific dates or pieces are noted in the CCE record, but the renewal could potentially cover the segment in this book titled 'We Have Plenty to Say' that ran in the January 1946 issue, as well as a few other segments that appeared in later 1946 issues.
